verses.verse: Now these are they that came <WH935> <WH8802> to David <WH1732> to Ziklag <WH6860>, while he yet kept himself close <WH6113> <WH8803> because <WH6440> of Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027>: and they were among the mighty men <WH1368>, helpers <WH5826> <WH8802> of the war <WH4421>.

They were armed <WH5401> <WH8802> with bows <WH7198>, and could use both the right hand <WH3231> <WH8688> and the left <WH8041> <WH8688> in hurling stones <WH68> and shooting arrows <WH2671> out of a bow <WH7198>, even of Saul's <WH7586> brethren <WH251> of Binyamin <WH1144>.

The chief <WH7218> was Ahiezer <WH295>, then Yo'ash <WH3101>, the sons <WH1121> of Shemaah <WH8094> the Gibeathite <WH1395>; and Jeziel <WH3149>, and Pelet <WH6404>, the sons <WH1121> of Azmaveth <WH5820>; and Berachah <WH1294>, and Yehu <WH3058> the Antothite <WH6069>,

And Ismaiah <WH3460> the Giv`onite <WH1393>, a mighty man <WH1368> among the thirty <WH7970>, and over the thirty <WH7970>; and Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>, and YAHaziel <WH3166>, and Johanan <WH3110>, and Josabad <WH3107> the Gederathite <WH1452>,
Eluzai <WH498>, and Jerimoth <WH3406>, and Bealiah <WH1183>, and Shemariah <WH8114>, and Shephatiah <WH8203> the Haruphite <WH2741>,
Elkanah <WH511>, and Jesiah <WH3449>, and Azareel <WH5832>, and Joezer <WH3134>, and Jashobeam <WH3434>, the Korhites <WH7145>,
And Joelah <WH3132>, and Zebadiah <WH2069>, the sons <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395> of Gedor <WH1446>.

And of the Gadites <WH1425> there separated <WH914> <WH8738> themselves unto David <WH1732> into the hold <WH4679> to the wilderness <WH4057> men <WH1368> of might <WH2428>, and men <WH582> of war <WH6635> fit for the battle <WH4421>, that could handle <WH6186> <WH8802> shield <WH6793> and buckler <WH7420>, whose faces <WH6440> were like the faces <WH6440> of lions <WH738>, and were as swift <WH4116> <WH8763> as the roes <WH6643> upon the mountains <WH2022>;
Ezer <WH5829> the first <WH7218>, `Ovadyah-yahu <WH5662> the second <WH8145>, Eliab <WH446> the third <WH7992>,
Mishmannah <WH4925> the fourth <WH7243>, Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> the fifth <WH2549>,
Attai <WH6262> the sixth <WH8345>, Eliel <WH447> the seventh <WH7637>,
Johanan <WH3110> the eighth <WH8066>, Elzabad <WH443> the ninth <WH8671>,
Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> the tenth <WH6224>, Machbanai <WH4344> the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240>.

These were of the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410>, captains <WH7218> of the host <WH6635>: one <WH259> of the least <WH6996> was over an hundred <WH3967>, and the greatest <WH1419> over a thousand <WH505>.

These are they that went over <WH5674> <WH8804> Yarden <WH3383> in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, when it had overflown <WH4390> <WH8764> all his banks <WH1415> <WH8675> <WH1428>; and they put to flight <WH1272> <WH8686> all them of the valleys <WH6010>, both toward the east <WH4217>, and toward the west <WH4628>.
And there came <WH935> <WH8799> of the children <WH1121> of Binyamin <WH1144> and Y'hudah <WH3063> to the hold <WH4679> unto David <WH1732>.

And David <WH1732> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> to meet <WH6440> them, and answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, If ye be come <WH935> <WH8804> peaceably <WH7965> unto me to help <WH5826> <WH8800> me, mine heart <WH3824> shall be knit <WH3162> unto you: but if ye be come to betray <WH7411> <WH8763> me to mine enemies <WH6862>, seeing there is no <WH3808> wrong <WH2555> in mine hands <WH3709>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of our fathers <WH1> look <WH7200> <WH8799> thereon, and rebuke <WH3198> <WH8686> it.

Then the spirit <WH7307> came <WH3847> <WH8804> upon Amasai <WH6022>, who was chief <WH7218> of the captains <WH7970> <WH8677> <WH7991>, and he said, Thine are we, David <WH1732>, and on thy side, thou son <WH1121> of Yishai <WH3448>: peace <WH7965>, peace <WH7965> be unto thee, and peace <WH7965> be to thine helpers <WH5826> <WH8802>; for thy 'Elohim <WH430> helpeth <WH5826> <WH8804> thee. Then David <WH1732> received <WH6901> <WH8762> them, and made <WH5414> <WH8799> them captains <WH7218> of the band <WH1416>.

And there fell <WH5307> <WH8804> some of M'nasheh <WH4519> to David <WH1732>, when he came <WH935> <WH8800> with the Philistines <WH6430> against Saul <WH7586> to battle <WH4421>: but they helped <WH5826> <WH8804> them not: for the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> upon advisement <WH6098> sent <WH7971> <WH8765> him away, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, He will fall <WH5307> <WH8799> to his master <WH113> Saul <WH7586> to the jeopardy of our heads <WH7218>.

As he went <WH3212> <WH8800> to Ziklag <WH6860>, there fell <WH5307> <WH8804> to him of M'nasheh <WH4519>, Adnah <WH5734>, and Jozabad <WH3107>, and Jediael <WH3043>, and Mikha'el <WH4317>, and Jozabad <WH3107>, and Elihu <WH453>, and Zilthai <WH6769>, captains <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> that were of M'nasheh <WH4519>.
And they helped <WH5826> <WH8804> David <WH1732> against the band <WH1416> of the rovers: for they were all mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>, and were captains <WH8269> in the host <WH6635>.

For at that time <WH6256> day <WH3117> by day <WH3117> there came <WH935> <WH8799> to David <WH1732> to help <WH5826> <WH8800> him, until it was a great <WH1419> host <WH4264>, like the host <WH4264> of 'Elohim <WH430>.

And these are the numbers <WH4557> of the bands <WH7218> that were ready armed <WH2502> <WH8803> to the war <WH6635>, and came <WH935> <WH8804> to David <WH1732> to Hevron <WH2275>, to turn <WH5437> <WH8687> the kingdom <WH4438> of Saul <WH7586> to him, according to the word <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>.

The children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> that bare <WH5375> <WH8802> shield <WH6793> and spear <WH7420> were six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> and eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967>, ready armed <WH2502> <WH8803> to the war <WH6635>.
Of the children <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095>, mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428> for the war <WH6635>, seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> and one hundred <WH3967>.
Of the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>.
And Y'hoyada <WH3077> was the leader <WH5057> of the Aharonites <WH175>, and with him were three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967>;
And Zadok <WH6659>, a young man <WH5288> mighty <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>, and of his father's <WH1> house <WH1004> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> captains <WH8269>.

And of the children <WH1121> of Binyamin <WH1144>, the kindred <WH251> of Saul <WH7586>, three <WH7969> thousand <WH505>: for hitherto the greatest <WH4768> part of them had kept <WH8104> <WH8802> the ward <WH4931> of the house <WH1004> of Saul <WH7586>.

And of the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669> twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> and eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967>, mighty <WH1368> men <WH582> of valour <WH2428>, famous <WH8034> throughout the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>.

And of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of M'nasheh <WH4519> eighteen <WH8083> <WH6240> thousand <WH505>, which were expressed <WH5344> <WH8738> by name <WH8034>, to come <WH935> <WH8800> and make David <WH1732> king <WH4427> <WH8687>.

And of the children <WH1121> of Yissakhar <WH3485>, which were men that had understanding <WH998> <WH3045> <WH8802> of the times <WH6256>, to know <WH3045> <WH8800> what Yisra'EL <WH3478> ought to do <WH6213> <WH8799>; the heads <WH7218> of them were two hundred <WH3967>; and all their brethren <WH251> were at their Mitzvah <WH6310>.

Of Z'vulun <WH2074>, such as went forth <WH3318> <WH8802> to battle <WH6635>, expert <WH6186> <WH8802> in war <WH4421>, with all instruments <WH3627> of war <WH4421>, fifty <WH2572> thousand <WH505>, which could keep rank <WH5737> <WH8800>: they were not of double <WH3820> heart <WH3820>.
And of Naftali <WH5321> a thousand <WH505> captains <WH8269>, and with them with shield <WH6793> and spear <WH2595> thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505>.
And of the Danites <WH1839> expert <WH6186> <WH8802> in war <WH4421> twenty <WH6242> and eight <WH8083> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>.
And of Asher <WH836>, such as went forth <WH3318> <WH8802> to battle <WH6635>, expert <WH6186> <WH8800> in war <WH4421>, forty <WH705> thousand <WH505>.

And on the other side <WH5676> of Yarden <WH3383>, of the Re'uvenites <WH7206>, and the Gadites <WH1425>, and of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, with all manner of instruments <WH3627> of war <WH6635> for the battle <WH4421>, an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505>.

All these men <WH582> of war <WH4421>, that could keep <WH5737> <WH8802> rank <WH4634>, came <WH935> <WH8804> with a perfect <WH8003> heart <WH3820> to Hevron <WH2275>, to make David <WH1732> king <WH4427> <WH8687> over all Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and all the rest <WH7611> also of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were of one <WH259> heart <WH3824> to make David <WH1732> king <WH4427> <WH8687>.
And there they were with David <WH1732> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>, eating <WH398> <WH8802> and drinking <WH8354> <WH8802>: for their brethren <WH251> had prepared <WH3559> <WH8689> for them.

Moreover they that were nigh <WH7138> them, even unto Yissakhar <WH3485> and Z'vulun <WH2074> and Naftali <WH5321>, brought <WH935> <WH8688> bread <WH3899> on asses <WH2543>, and on camels <WH1581>, and on mules <WH6505>, and on oxen <WH1241>, and meat <WH3978>, meal <WH7058>, cakes <WH1690> of figs, and bunches of raisins <WH6778>, and wine <WH3196>, and oil <WH8081>, and oxen <WH1241>, and sheep <WH6629> abundantly <WH7230>: for there was joy <WH8057> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
